availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary A. Lothridge. Father of Sarah A. Lothridge, Harriet Lothridge, John T. Lothrdige, Melissa E. Lothridge, William Lothridge, Sarah Lothridge, James M. Lothridge, and Rebeca A. Lothridge. Farmer in Warren County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Warren County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 2, p. 67A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 1, p. 95.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, Lucus Precinct, p. 227A.
